latestMedia.title: Ku San Malamanku tare da Sayyada Hafsat Sheriff Ibrahim Saleh
latestMedia.description: Sayyada Hafsat, wadda ke rayuwa a garin Maiduguri na jihar Borno ta ce ta yi karatu a wurin mahaifinta da maigidanta da kuma wasu malaman da dama.

latestMedia.title: Ramadan 2025: Yadda za ku turo mana girke-girkenku na buɗe-baki
latestMedia.description: Kamar yadda muka saba a kowace shekara, za ku iya aiko wa BBC bidiyon girke-girkenku don koya wa mutane ta waɗannan hanyoyi.

latestMedia.title: ...Daga Bakin Mai Ita tare da Zainab ta Labarina
latestMedia.description: Daga Bakin Mai Ita, shiri ne da ke tattaunawa da taurarin fina-finan Hausa da wasu fitattun mutane, domin yin bayani game da rayuwarsu ta yau da kullum

latestMedia.title: Matashin da mata ke son ya yi musu kitso
latestMedia.description: Gilbert Ogoniwari matashi ne wanda ya yi fice kan yadda yake rangaɗa wa mata kitso.
